group_1.textLeft: It's true. I've already graduated from high school,
but I'm an active Magical Girl...
Was from the lady, huh!

group_1.textRight: B-but...because of that magic we felt here,
we thought a Witch or Magical Girl was around@and working against us...

group_1.textLeft: Ah? So we were mistaken this whole time? You@mean that magic had nothin' to do with anythin'?
Just because we were mistaken doesn't mean@there wasn't a possibility.
I haven't heard a thing about the two trucks@disappearing in the news.
Besides, we have a lead on finding out the truth.
Miss... Miss, you're...
You're the culprit behind this, aren't ya?
You're terribly mistaken!!

group_1.textRight: Even if you say that, I'm still suspicious.@I'm going to have to ask for some explanation.

group_1.textLeft: I'm telling you I haven't done anything!!
I don't have any evidence, but please believe me!
I've worked so hard to open this store.
My entire family has supported me, especially@my little sister who's called me every day.
And my little sister is the one coming here today.
She's coming all the way from the countryside by@herself. I want to make this a success for her.
That's my heart laid bare!
I have no reason to make the trucks disappear!

group_1.textRight: I think we oughta believe her.

group_1.textLeft: And I want to believe her...
When we got all the ingredients,@everyone was so kind to us.
Everyone, they're all supporting this lady...
I don't want to believe she's a bad person.

group_1.textRight: ...But she has a nice little sister.@I don't...[chara:100401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100401:cheek_0][chara:100401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100401:lipSynch_1]get along with my siblings...
When will your sister be here?

group_1.textLeft: Right, about that— she said she would be here@before opening time, but...
Actually, I haven't been able to contact her@since yesterday.

group_1.textRight: She must have gotten dragged into danger...

group_1.textLeft: No reason for alarm. She's no softy.
Because she's also...@[chara:800600:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]A Magical Girl.
There! A truck! Both of them, even!

group_1.textRight: Let's watch out for the Familiars and help him out!

group_1.textLeft: He's safe for now, but if we stick around@he's going to be targeted again.
I'll carry him to a safe distance, so Iroha,@please support me.

group_1.textRight: I'll shoot down any familiars chasing you, Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
ёБжЙЩЭГНKEKEKE

group_1.textRight: I thought for sure more would be coming...@Where are the other Familiars...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah! Over there! On the trucks!

group_1.textRight: Do you think what the Witch is after...

group_1.textLeft: Isn't just human life...

group_1.textRight: But what's in the trucks too?!

group_1.textLeft: It's that time again!
The daily!@Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!
Today's guest is a Black Feather!
We're nearly at the finale and we get a guest@who lacks in oomph...

group_1.textRight: I suppose you're right...@It's not like I'm a character or anything...

group_1.textLeft: P-please don't worry about that!@Now, your favorite topping!
Not only is that not a topping, it's also an incredibly@difficult achievement...
Fortune time!@If you order the 10 spices curry today...
A character at work or your school might become@a pain in the butt!

group_1.textRight: If you want to characterize someone,@fly your way over to CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
